name: Apparel IQ Holding Limited
description: Provider of an online fashion advisory platform intended to offer curated shopping service for men. The company's platform offers a personalized shopping service where one can seek new fashion suggestions from stylists and ask the kind of apparel to be worn for a particular occasion as per individual size, complexion, and height, enabling men shoppers to find and order personalized outfits that are delivered at desired venues.
one_liner: Provider of an online fashion advisory platform intended to offer curated shopping service for men. The company's platform offers a personalized shopping service where one can seek new fashion suggestions from stylists and ask the kind of apparel to be worn for a particular occasion as per individual size, complexion, and height, enabling men shoppers to find and order personalized outfits that are delivered at desired venues.
